title: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman meets EU delegation to discuss FTA, other issues - Economic Times
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman meets EU delegation to discuss FTA, other issues  Economic Times
description: "Finance Minister Smt @nsitharaman and Mr @berndlange agreed that there is keenness to move ahead on India-EU negotiations with Bilateral Investment Treaty, Free Trade Agreement and Geographical Indications Agreement," the ministry said in another tweet.
